subject: TestListener & TestResult question.
msgSnippet: Hello! I d like to provide additional logging for failures and errors for my tests,  which use HttpUnit. And I suppose that TestListener interface is a right
messageBody:
Hello!

I'd like to provide additional logging for failures and errors for
my tests, which use HttpUnit. And I suppose that TestListener
interface is a right way to do it.

But, unfortunately, I have no idea how to use it. More exactly,
I don't know, how to obtain TestResult object to call addListener
method.

I would appreciate any help.

With best regards,
KIR
